page.title: 14HOUSING
page.content: WE MADE A SURVEY OF THE PRIVATE HOUSING IN OUR AREA AND FOUND THAT APPROXIAMETLY THREE QUARTERS OF THE HOUSES WERE BUILT BEFORE 1900. LESS THAN 10% HAD BEEN BUILT IN THE PAST 20 YEARS. SOME OF THE HOUSING GOES BACK TO THE TIME OF ELIZABETH I BUT MOST OF IT WAS BUILT IN THE 19TH CENTURY. THERE ARE VERY FEW BUNGALOWS AND MOST OF THE HOUSES ARE DETACHED. THE SMALL NUMBER OF ATTACHED HOUSES ARE GENERALLY TO BE FOUND IN THE SMALL ESTATES OF COUNCIL HOUSING IN LONG SUTTON AND SOUTH WARNBOROUGH. IN THE RAF MARRIED QUARTERS AT RAF ODIHAM THERE ARE SEVERAL ROWS OF TERRACED HOUSES. BECAUSE THE PRIVATE HOUSES IN OUR AREA ARE NOW VERY EXPENSIVE, THERE ARE NOT MANY YOUNG LOCAL PEOPLE ABLE TO BUY AND THIS MEANS THEY HAVE TO MOVE AWAY.
